title: Sexcapades: Cynthia and the Conductor
description: Cynthia is in for the ride of her life. Cynthia needs to forget the guy who dumped her. One plane ticket and a rail pass through Europe should do the trick. Shaking off the past and the prude she used to be is hard until Cynthia meets a certain train conductor who wants make sure sheâ€™s one hundred percent satisfied with her ride. About the series: Sexcapades is a series of uninhibited sexual escapades from your favorite best selling romance authors. sexcapades-stories.com
